revised_title: Bills of Mortality: A Century of Demographic Data from the Electoral City of Freyberg, Saxony
tldr: This article presents a century-long demographic analysis of the city of Freyberg, Saxony, including data on births, marriages, deaths, and communicants from 1617 to 1717. The data reveals fluctuations in population and highlights the impact of events such as wars and plagues on mortality rates.
